name: BigNumber
summary: Allows for use of large (2048-bit and up) numbers in Swift
description:
Implements a protocol called BigNumber which can be easily conformed to, and this basically allows
for the use of really big numbers like 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF and stuff.
This library uses the Little-Endian format.
